item.title: Spread of COVID-19
item.author: ben2koos@gmail.com (Ben Koos)
item.description: If you play around with the slider on the interactive chart below you can see how COVID-19 spread throughout the contiguous United States. (Note: if you are viewing this in mobile, the frame below is probably wider than the text in the rest of this post. This is my first post and I’m a newbie at HTML. If anyone knows how to make an iframe look good on both mobile and desktop simultenously, I’d love to learn from you!
